text: Dima Gorin's Career () is a 1961 Soviet comedy movie directed by Frunze Dovlatyan and Lev Mirsky.Пять лучших советских фильмов о рабочем классеКАРЬЕРА ДИМЫ ГОРИНА It stars Aleksandr Demyanenko, Tatyana Konyukhova, and Vladimir Seleznyov. == Actors == *Aleksandr Demyanenko as Dmitry Grigoryevich Gorin *Tatyana Konyukhova as Galya Beryozka, brigadier *Vladimir Seleznyov as Gennady Drobot, brigadier *Vladimir Vysotsky as driver Sofron *Yevgeny Kudryashyov as Ivan Moskalyov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1961 movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: Dima Gorin's Career
